title: Egyptian Media Encourages Voters To Get To Polls â€” Or Else
teaser: Egypt has added a third day of voting in its presidential election. With Abdel Fattah al-Sisi relying on voter turnout to legitimize his election, the government-allied media is exhorting Egyptians to vote or be considered traitors.
